results.title: Beta-Blockers Use and Risk of Breast Cancer in Women with Hypertension.
results.text_hl: Modification of agents acting on the @GENE_REN @GENE_5972 @@@renin@@@-angiotensin system on @<m>DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ risk was also observed for @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Zheng G, Sundquist J, Sundquist K, Ji J. Beta-Blockers Use and Risk of Breast Cancer in Women with Hypertension. Cancer Epidemiol Biomarkers Prev. 2021 May;30(5):965-973. PMID: 33619022

results.title: Aspirin and atenolol enhance metformin activity against breast cancer by targeting both neoplastic and microenvironment cells
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@Aspirin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ enhance @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ activity against @<m>DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ by targeting both neoplastic and microenvironment cells

citations.NLM: Talarico G, Orecchioni S, Dallaglio K, Reggiani F, Mancuso P, Calleri A, Gregato G, Labanca V, Rossi T, Noonan DM, Albini A, Bertolini F. Aspirin and atenolol enhance metformin activity against breast cancer by targeting both neoplastic and microenvironment cells Sci Rep. 2016 Jan 5;6():18673. PMID: 26728433

results.title: Beta blockers and breast cancer mortality: a population- based study.
results.text_hl: There was no difference in T4 or N2/N3/@DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid_Acute @DISEASE_MESH:D015470 @@@M1 tumor@@@ incidence or @<m>DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@-specific mortality between @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ users and matched nonusers.

citations.NLM: Barron TI, Connolly RM, Sharp L, Bennett K, Visvanathan K. Beta blockers and breast cancer mortality: a population- based study. J Clin Oncol. 2011 Jul 1;29(19):2635-44. PMID: 21632503
